headline: Teak Laser Cleaning
alternativeHeadline: Advanced Laser Ablation Techniques for Teak
description: Laser cleaning of teak (Tectona grandis) utilizes pulsed near-infrared radiation to ablate surface contaminants via photomechanical and photothermal effects. The process is highly selective due to the...

about.name: Teak
about.description: Teak material for laser cleaning applications

mainEntity.name: How to Laser Clean Teak
mainEntity.description: Process for laser cleaning Teak using 1064 nm (primary), 532 nm (optional for finer control) wavelength

step.name: Material Preparation
step.text: Secure Teak component in laser processing fixture

step.name: Parameter Configuration
step.text: Configure laser parameters: 1064 nm (primary), 532 nm (optional for finer control) wavelength

step.name: Surface Treatment
